Build a self-sustaining community using renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydro power.
Develop a new form of energy storage technology that can efficiently store and release energy generated from renewable sources.
Create a system of underground tunnels and pipes that can transport electricity generated from renewable sources to areas without access to electricity.
Develop a new type of battery that can store energy generated from renewable sources for long-term use.
Create a device that can convert kinetic energy from human movement into electrical energy, which can be used to power small devices.
